ygData.subject: Re: languages
ygData.msgSnippet: No.. you could just play your character.. and hang around people from that race.. you ll eventually pick the language up.  You dont have to result to spamming.
ygData.messageBody:
No.. you could just play your character.. and hang around people from that race.. you'll eventually pick the language up. You dont have to result to spamming.

Drev
